title: Playing support looking for competent adc players (silver)
body:
Ign: Foxilite

I can play most of the peel supports to a high level, but my best is nami and if needed can play leona or poppy support for frontline occasionally.

replies.body:
Hey Fox, i am looking for a competent supp to help me out im b3 currently but climbing well - if you want to try me out and see would love to have a game with you. i cant tell you how many games i lose because of troll supps or just plain awful supps..very frustrating for the ADC role.

hit  me up..

lads
